archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.1.10a: a) identifying and obtaining patches for known vulnerabilities (including patch bundles, critical updates and service packs) from authorised sources, as soon as they are available
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
